metadata.title: RZ/A: Boundary scan mode setting timing

sections.content:
Question:
At what point should BSCANP be set to H to enter boundary scan mode?
Answer:
The BSCANP pin selects whether the JTAG pin is used in debug mode or boundary scan mode, and the BSCANP is not intended to be changed during operation.
Please set the BSCANP pin to the desired pin level and then release the reset.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1 Group, 
RZ/A2M,
RZ/A3UL
